name: RelaxingAudioBambooChimes
0:
”Alexa, open bamboo chimes”
”Alexa, start bamboo chimes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bamboo chimes
des:
In Chinese tradition, the chime symbolises peace, harmony and prosperity. Presenting one as a gift to a special person is to wish them happiness and good health. This bamboo sound gives you a realistic audio experience of a bamboo chimes blowing in the wind.

Use bamboo chimes to relax, help you meditate or just to help you visualise that you're in a peaceful asian garden.

If you enjoy this skill feel free leave a review, you can find some of our other sound skills by searching "RP Apps" in the Alexa app store.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
